experience.description: Developed a responsive business website for ConsultWarrior, showcasing their services and details. Implementing industry standards and creating reusable components ensured an organized codebase. I also integrated React-Hook Forms for user data management and Email.js for responses, and hosted the site on Hostinger.

Developed a responsive website using React and Bootstrap, ensuring seamless user experience across devices. I enhanced user trust and visibility with a visually appealing UI and SEO best practices, integrated Google Forms for efficient data collection, and used ImageKit.io for fast image delivery, hosting on Hostinger for reliable performance.
